Long live the\nRevolution</i>\".<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Below an aged Madan Singh:-</span><br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-qsgZ-JHZRPc/UR8smGIKKNI/AAAAAAAAfNY/fmtFtz-xKjA/s1600/madan.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-qsgZ-JHZRPc/UR8smGIKKNI/AAAAAAAAfNY/fmtFtz-xKjA/s400/madan.jpg\" width=\"336\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Two aspects stood out\nin the eyes of the British. One was that the participants were sailors who in\ngeneral were much more educated than the average gullible illiterate recruit in\nto the British Indian Army. &nbsp;Secondly, the\nring-leaders were from the Telegraphists Branch, who again were more educated and\nintelligent than the average rating. &nbsp;And\nthe Telegraphists used their trade to effectively spread their message (like a\nwild fire). &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Then there was another\nfactor that did not escape the British. While the Indian Officers all did not\nparticipate, almost all of them , except a few Parsis were very sympathetic to\nthe cause.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">During the mutint there was NO cooking in the navy- all food came\nfrom private houses and hotels, free . Common people , men women and children ,\ncame out in support of the ratings; and demonstrations and strikes were held\nall over the country.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To sum it up, the\nBritish realized that THE strongest pillar of their system was vulnerable.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Some\nof the ratings in HMIS Talwar were reported to have Communist leanings and on a\nsearch of 38 ratings who were arrested in the HMIS New Delhi, 15 were found to\nbe subscribers of CPI literature.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Without the Royal navy\nthey were cut off from England. Indians in the Armed forces were no longer\ntrust worthy. &nbsp;The Navy mutiny, that no\none since Independence heard of ( till the Internet age ) did to the British\ncolonization, what no other action including Quit India movement could have\ndone in the long struggle of 250 years.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>To hell with Gandhi , his Ahimsa and\nhis non- fuckin' -violence. </b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-X6ADFtUikkE/UR8Vo1YVQyI/AAAAAAAAfM0/Cvpnqn68gDg/s1600/imagesbehtrt.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-X6ADFtUikkE/UR8Vo1YVQyI/AAAAAAAAfM0/Cvpnqn68gDg/s400/imagesbehtrt.jpg\" width=\"309\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: magenta; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>INDIA WON INDEPENDENCE\nBY VIOLENT INTENT , AND STRIKING FEAR INTO BRITISH HEARTS&nbsp;, NOT NON VIOLENT SATYAGRAHA , OF ROTHSCHILD'S SOUTH AFRICAN &nbsp;PLANT GANDHI . &nbsp;&nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>LET THIS BE KNOWN TO THE FUTURE GENERATIONS OF\nINDIA.&nbsp; &nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>THE FASTER WE REVISE OUR HISTORY TEXT BOOKS\nTHE BETTER. &nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>NON VIOLENCE AGAINST AN\nINVADER IS USELESS.</b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The British hushed up\nthe whole incident and destroyed ALL records, as per orders from England.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A naval ship INS Madan\nSingh\u2019, was named after the mutiny leader after 52 years . &nbsp;Another ship was named for former leading\ntelegraphist B.C. Dutt Dutt too. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-TlNm2qv1y3w/UR8VgjbzXoI/AAAAAAAAfMs/GT69CGA7UCM/s1600/rin.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-TlNm2qv1y3w/UR8VgjbzXoI/AAAAAAAAfMs/GT69CGA7UCM/s1600/rin.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A\nsailor holding the wheel memorial now exists at Cooperage, Colaba, Mumbai. &nbsp;After the outbreak of the mutiny, the first\nthing they did was to storm the naval prison and free B.C. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/11/save-5900-year-old-sabarimala.html?showComment=1543023440705#c8096423979381418071\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">November 24, 2018 at 7:07 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nTHE KHALISTANI MOVEMENT WAS FOUNDED BY CRYPTO JEW SIKHS WITH PALE EYES AND VERY MEAN CHARACTER, WHO BURIED THEIR DEAD ( NOT CREMATED )..<br />\n<br />\nTHE GURU GRANTH SAHIB WAS COMPILED BY A JEWISH WHITE MAN WEARING TURBAN, MAX ARTHUR MACAULIFFE ..WHO PACKED THE BOOK WITH VERSES OF THE DASAS..<br />\n<br />\nWE IN INDIA NEVER HEARD OF THESE DASAS OR THE BHAKTI MOVEMENT TILL THE WHITE INVADER CAME TO INDIA..<br />\n<br />\nTHE SIKH HOLY BOOK AS THE 11TH GURU WAS USED AS A \"LIVING ORACLE\" IN ALL BATTLE FIELDS OF WORLD WARS ONE AND TWO..<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2013/07/unknown-history-of-sikhs-and-sikhism.html<br />\n<br />\nTHOUSANDS OF NAIVE SIKHS ( ON CHANNE KA JHAAD ) GIVEN EXTRA RUM SACRIFICED THEIR LIVES , JUST BECAUSE THE CRYPTO JEW&nbsp; WEARING TURBAN WHO HELD THE BOOK AS A MEDIUM TO THE ORACLE ( BOOK ) TOLD THEM THAT IT IS WAHEGURUs WILL..<br />\n<br />\nGandhi recruited 13 lakh ( 1.3 million ) Indian soldiers in the first world war \u2013 out of which 111000 ( 1.11 lakh ) Indian soldiers were killed .<br />\n<br />\nGandhi recruited 25 lakh ( 2.5 million ) Indian soldiers in the second World war. Out of this 243000 ( 2.43 lakh) soldiers were killed.<br />\n<br />\n70% OF THE DEAD INDIAN SOLDIERS WERE SIKHS AND MAHARS..<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2015/10/the-only-dalit-freemason-of-india-capt.html<br />\n<br />\nTODAY KHALISTANIS HAS A BASE IN PAKISTAN.. ARMS COME FROM CANADA, FUNDED BY DRUGS ..<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c8096423979381418071\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 0px;\"><div>\n<br /></div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></b></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\" /></span><br />\n<ol id=\"top-ra\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c7658593315981173589\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img alt=\"\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"background: rgb(255, 255, 255); border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 1px 1px 5px; max-width: 36px; padding: 5px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/12/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load_26.html?showComment=1545885876015#c7658593315981173589\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">December 27, 2018 at 10:14 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nhttps://www.ndtv.com/india-news/kerala-float-based-on-vaikom-satyagraha-may-not-make-it-to-republic-day-parade-1968549<br /><br />GANDHI ENTERED KERALA FOR MANY REASONS..<br /><br />ONE WAS THE KHILAFAT MOVEMENT TO SUPPORT THE TURKISH SULTAN.. GANDHI CAME ALONG WITH THE ALI JAUHAR BROTHERS ..<br /><br />GANDHI WAS A KATHIAWARI JAIN JEW , THE TURKISH SULTAN WAS A CRYPTO JEW, MOHAMMAD ALI JAUHAR WAS A CRYPTO JEW ..<br /><br />THE WHOLE IDEA WAS TO WEDGE APART HINDUS AND MUSLIMS WHO WERE LIVING IN HARMONY AFTER JEW TIPU SULTAN BLASTED KERALA TEMPLES TO STEAL GOLD..<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/10/tipu-sultan-unmasked-capt-ajit.html<br /><br />THE MOHAMMAD ALI JAUHAR ROAD IN MUMBAI IS NAMED AFTER THIS JEW.. I HAVE VISITED HIS KOSHER GRAVE IN JERUSALEM..<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/03/fatawa-e-alamgiri-kosher-document-of.html<br /><br />ROTHSCHILDs AGENT GANDHI USED THE WORD INDIGO FOR OPIUM.. GERMAN JEW ROTHSCHILD WHO RULED INDIA GREW OPIUM IN INDIA AND SOLD IT IN CHINA..<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/04/fake-champaran-satyagraha-of-gandhi.html<br /><br />70 % OF THE LATTER PART OF THE TURKISH SULTANS WERE CRYPTO JEWS..<br /><br />80% OF THE LATTER PART OF THE MOGHUL EMPERORS , AFTER HHUMAYUN, WERE CRYPTO JEWS ..<br /><br />THE BRITISH ROYALTY IS GERMAN JEW ..<br /><br />GANDHIs KATHIAWARI JAIN JEW CLAN ARE THE DIAMOND AGENTS OF JEW ROTHSCHILD IN ANTWERP.. THEY PRAY AT AKSHARDHAM TEMPLES WITTH GOD GHANSHYAM PANDE ( SWAMINARAYAN ) WHICH MODI SPONSORS..<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/02/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_12.html<br /><br /><br />This KHILAFAT MOVEMENT sponsored by Kathiwari Jain crypto JEW Gandhi was to ostensibly support a distant Muslim Turkey ruler .<br /><br /><br />Pretty soon the Kerala half breed Muslims ( Mappilas ) turned against the North Kerala Hindus and drove away one lakh hindus ( official estimate ) .<br /><br />Countless Hindus were beheaded and every well, pond, river and water body was full of rotting corpses . All Hindu lands were usurped by the Muslims .<br /><br />The Mappilas stocked their mosques with food , water , long spears and khilafat swords -and this was NO knee jerk attack, but a pre-meditated and long planned one .<br /><br />The MALABAR SPECIAL POLICE was formed by the British --who were angry as some white women and children were murdered by the Mappilas . Mind you, before Islam was born Mappilas were Hindu Arab middlemen of the Calicut king , for the spice caravan route.<br /><br />This unit of 800 police were DESH BHAKTS , all KALARI EXPERTS all more than 6 feet in height and well built .<br /><br />Along with the nippy Gurkha regiment they ran after the poor mappilas with swords and kurkhris and captured all of the MOPLAH REVOLT mutineers .<br /><br />Both the MOPLAH REVOLT ( created by Gandhi ) and the NAVY MUTINY which gave India her freedom , had been sunk by ROTHSCHILD STOOGE Gandhi -- we will NOT allow these two incidents to be DELETED from history .<br /><br />The British took revenge for the murder of the white women and children --<br /><br />On 20th Nov 1921, they packed up a train compartment full of the worst criminal mappilas and most of them died on the passage from Tanur Kerala to Podanur Tamil Nadu jail .<br /><br />When the compartment was opened the mappila prisoners had clawed and eaten each other-- due to a type of toxic wet paint inside the compartment -- they went berserk due to the fumes and lack of oxygen .<br /><br />RETRIBUTION OF THE MOST SEVERE KIND .<br /><br />THE MALABAR SPECIAL REGIMENT GAVE INDIA INDEPENDENCE .. font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The 7000 year old Rig\nVeda, written in Sanskrit, has 117 hymns about a wonder elexir by the name of\nSoma.&nbsp; And thousands of temples have the\nSamudra Manthan depicted , extracting amrit by churning the ocean&nbsp; .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>We\nhave drunk the Soma;<o:p></o:p></b></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>We\nhave become immortal;<o:p></o:p></b></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>We\nhave gone to the light;<o:p></o:p></b></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>We\nhave found the gods &nbsp;&nbsp;</b></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>Rig Veda 8.48 - 5000 BC</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There are two main\npaths in Hinduism. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One is the Advaita (\nnon-dual ) and the other is Dwaita ( dual ) philosophies of Sanatana Dharma.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-m1ymOHyI2nA/URzpQulAH5I/AAAAAAAAfEs/XK1s0CkoNUs/s1600/imagesffe.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-m1ymOHyI2nA/URzpQulAH5I/AAAAAAAAfEs/XK1s0CkoNUs/s1600/imagesffe.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Advaita form looks\nat God , as brahmAn-- the intelligent morphogenetic consciousness field , the\nakasha&nbsp; or&nbsp;</span><span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"> the space between the whizzing electrons</b></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To the spiritual\neastern mind, the story of SAMUDRA MANTHAN produces amazing acts of faith like\nthe Kumbh Mela , which has been going on for 7000 years. This year 2013, the\nMaha Kumbh mela will attract 110 million pilgrims, which is more than the\nentire population of many large countries..</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-97srUqwB7mI/URu68R9dQPI/AAAAAAAAe6A/EM-m2cx8lcQ/s1600/imagesnjjyrdn.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"248\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-97srUqwB7mI/URu68R9dQPI/AAAAAAAAe6A/EM-m2cx8lcQ/s400/imagesnjjyrdn.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Tamas and Rajas are\nconscious of each other.&nbsp; Amrit reveals\nthe fractal nature of consciousness. Amrit is NOT external, it is produced\ninside your head.&nbsp;&nbsp; All you need to know\nis how to produce it by your own mind.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The cosmic macro 5\nheaded serpent Vasuki is human micro DNA which gives us 5 senses. &nbsp;The human\nmicro pineal gland is cosmic macro Mount Meru. &nbsp;The sea is the brahmAn field. &nbsp;The Amrit is soma. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pineal DMT</span> the s<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">pirit\nmolecule that bends space-time , is the chemical messenger which links body and\nspirit.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You cant observe the quantum\nworld without your activated Pineal gland , the other 5 senses have too narrow\nbandwidths. Vedic maharishis had the inherent ability to go on either side of\nthe narrow band of five human senses. the invisible below the quantum screen\ngives rise to the visible.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-JG5NkmMoJ_Q/URvQk6aEvqI/AAAAAAAAe7A/7RYwjlBYcW0/s1600/imagesCATT4VVV.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"219\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-JG5NkmMoJ_Q/URvQk6aEvqI/AAAAAAAAe7A/7RYwjlBYcW0/s320/imagesCATT4VVV.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">At the time of death Seratonin and Melatonin in the\nbrain breaks down to Dimethyltryptamine or DMT, ( C12 N2 H16 ), just after the\noxygen stops circulating. This is the moment for the ultimate DMT trip. &nbsp;You see your whole past life as FRACTAL dvine\ngeometry. When you consume Soma, colours , sounds and numbers all show up as\nfractal geometry.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<object class=\"BLOGGER-youtube-video\" classid=\"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000\" codebase=\"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0\" data-thumbnail-src=\"http://3.gvt0.com/vi/0yzH2n7MLM8/0.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"320\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"http://www.youtube.com/v/0yzH2n7MLM8&fs=1&source=uds\" /><param name=\"bgcolor\" value=\"#FFFFFF\" /><param name=\"allowFullScreen\" value=\"true\" /><embed width=\"320\" height=\"266\"  src=\"http://www.youtube.com/v/0yzH2n7MLM8&fs=1&source=uds\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" allowfullscreen=\"true\"></embed></object></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The king of Gods (\nDevas ) Indra was a bit of a egomaniac.&nbsp;\nOnce he was riding on his elephant Airavata when he bumped into a seer\nDurvasa Muni on the way, who was famous for his short fuse. Everybody was in\nawe of Durvasa, and he always wore tattered clothes due to a vow of insanity he\nwas observing. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He had with him a\ngarland of heavenly flowers given to him by a nymph. He tossed the garland\ntowards Indra who placed it on his elephants head showing total insensitivity.\nThe elephant was disturbed by the strange scent of the flowers and it threw\ndown the garland on the ground and stamped on it. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Durvasa was upset seeing\nthe disrespect and cursed Indra, and told him that he would be thrown down from\nhis throne, the same way the garland was thrown down.. He also cursed all the\nDevas and said that they would soon lose their sheen.&nbsp; Indra immediately got down from the elephant\nand begged for forgiveness,by Durvasa would not retract the curse or even\nsoften it, and went on his way.. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When the Asuras (\ndemons ) heard of this they were overjoyed, and they attacked the Devas under\nthe leadership of Bali, (the King of Kerala ). The Devas were routed in battle\nand Bali became king of the universe. The gods were told by Brahma to go to\nVishnu for help.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vishnu told them to\nstrike a deal with the Asuras, and get them to join them as a team to churn\namrit or ambrosia ( nectar of immortality ) from the oceans, and promise to\nshare it 50-50 with them.. It was done long ago in the past at the end of the\nlast precession cycle ( 25675 years cycle )&nbsp;\n.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-YlBz8hYLU9I/URxz4-tygzI/AAAAAAAAfB8/NFaZq3R7cao/s1600/FGB.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-YlBz8hYLU9I/URxz4-tygzI/AAAAAAAAfB8/NFaZq3R7cao/s320/FGB.jpg\" width=\"244\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">And Vishnu would make\nsure that Asuras would NOT get a drop of it. There was no other alternative as\nSage Shukracharya the son of Bhrigu Rishi was on the side of the Asuras and was\ntraining them.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Shukracharya had a\npoint to prove to the Devas who had spurned him when he offered to be their\nguru. They chose Sage Brihaspati son of Maharishi Angira instead. Brihaspati is\nknown in other cultures as Zeus&nbsp; or Thor.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-mao3rNdAQxE/URx1KWi22DI/AAAAAAAAfCU/zTh7tirfKmU/s1600/imagesCAUDD2QU.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"299\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-mao3rNdAQxE/URx1KWi22DI/AAAAAAAAfCU/zTh7tirfKmU/s400/imagesCAUDD2QU.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lord Shiva had a mantra\nby the name of Sanjeevani. This mantra was very powerful and could revive a\ndead man. He would give it only to those who pleased him. One way to please him\nwas to hang upside down, on a high tree branch by your knees for one year.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If you fall asleep and\ndrop down you break you neck. You cannot talk and cannot consume food . Right\nbelow smoke would be sent up from a bonfire of dry leaves. Nobody dared to do\nthis penance. Shukracharya was determined to please Shiva and get hold of this\nmantra.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-zArngbz8WB4/URx06aGlUSI/AAAAAAAAfCM/WheQJqUcUb4/s1600/imagesCABR9YEB.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"315\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-zArngbz8WB4/URx06aGlUSI/AAAAAAAAfCM/WheQJqUcUb4/s320/imagesCABR9YEB.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Everybody was keeping\nkeen vigilance of this penance as the one year completion date was getting\nnear. The King of the Devas Lord Indra panicked and decided to play a bit\ndirty. He sent his daughter disguised as a brahmin woman past the sentries.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">She\nthrew some dry red&nbsp; chillies into the fire\nwithout anybody noticing. The acrid fumes of the chillies made Shukracharyas\neyes bleed. The woman was filled with remorse.&nbsp;\nLord Shiva unable to tolerate this foul play immediately appeared and\ngave Shukracharya the mantra as a boon.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This churning of the\nocean was an elaborate process. &nbsp;Mount\nMandaranchal ( Meru ) was to be the churning dasher. &nbsp;Vasuki the King of serpents was to be the\nrope. &nbsp;Vishnu avatar Kurma a tortoise\nwould take the rotating Meru on its back. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-OP_gMYsmN4w/URvSP2a6QaI/AAAAAAAAe7I/M-PMoSVFDUY/s1600/imagesCAK9FV4K.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"299\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-OP_gMYsmN4w/URvSP2a6QaI/AAAAAAAAe7I/M-PMoSVFDUY/s400/imagesCAK9FV4K.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Smart Indra told the gods to hold the tail . &nbsp;The dumb asuras held the head, and they\nstarted churning to and fro for all they were worth. &nbsp;Asuras were getting scorched by flames which\nappeared frequently from the mouth of 5 headed Vasuki.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pretty soon Vasuki felt\nthe strain and vomited out deadly venom, which became so toxic and polymerizing\nforming a froth on the ocean , that all were scared.&nbsp; This would have been the end of the world.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lord Shiva was\ncompassionate and drank up this poison. Shiva's consort Parvati pressed his\nneck so that the poison would not reach his stomach. Shiva did not die, but his\nneck became blue and hence his name Neel Kanthan.( blue throated ).. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/--F3HvL-wJX4/UR0ZepM6XsI/AAAAAAAAfFk/zKhSpJXZATE/s1600/shivaratri6.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/--F3HvL-wJX4/UR0ZepM6XsI/AAAAAAAAfFk/zKhSpJXZATE/s1600/shivaratri6.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Shiva was advised by\nthe celestial doctors not to sleep, and keep dancing, so that the poison could\nbe burnt out and excreted . The gods took turns to amuse Shiva throughout the\nlong night. This night is a festival in India ( Shiva ratri -- or thanks giving\nnight for Shiva ) were Hindus fast all day , do NOT sleep at night , and have\ncultural festivities in all temples.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Kumbh Mela of 2013,\nends on 10 March 2013, which is Maha Shivaratri day.</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dhanwantari, the god of\nAyurveda , in 4 armed Vishnu form -holding the Sudarsana Chakra weapon and\nConch in the upper right and lefts hands. &nbsp;In the other two hands he carries a pot\ncontaining the nectar of immortality and a leech. ( which is used in Susruta\u2019s\ntreatise 4200 BC, for vaccination ) <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-h-HyfcQI1fI/URvSZEHkW4I/AAAAAAAAe7Q/kJK9kKWpAuY/s1600/imagesCAMWFT97.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"299\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-h-HyfcQI1fI/URvSZEHkW4I/AAAAAAAAe7Q/kJK9kKWpAuY/s400/imagesCAMWFT97.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Finally the churning\nwas successful and Lord Dhanvantari , the god of Ayurveda rose from the ocean.,\nwith a pot containing the nectar of immortality or amrit. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-RyzsOkPTX7s/USEKGNWLlCI/AAAAAAAAfSk/ee1k5jMbEqs/s1600/dhanvantri.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Some therapeutic uses\nof smoking: &nbsp;stops asthma attacks,\nreduces ocular pressure of those with Glaucoma, relieves nausea, stimulates\nappetites of chemotherapy patients and anorexics, lung expectorant, antispasmodic,\nreduces intensity of epileptic seizures, relieves symptoms of muscular\ndystrophy, relieves migraine headaches, lowers blood pressure, relaxes muscles,\nrelieves stress, promotes a restful sleep, relieves dementia and depression,\nand invokes positive 'vibrations'-all without the negative, and sometimes\ndeadly side effects of pharmaceuticals. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-2BZ33G1uuJ4/URveuXv7RNI/AAAAAAAAe84/gf_xJWpbiek/s1600/images+(1)cdfguuiii.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"240\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-2BZ33G1uuJ4/URveuXv7RNI/AAAAAAAAe84/gf_xJWpbiek/s400/images+(1)cdfguuiii.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Studies state that\ncannabis or cannabinoids may be useful in treating alcohol abuse, amyotrophic\nlateral sclerosis, collagen-induced arthritis, asthma, atherosclerosis, bipolar\ndisorder, colorectal cancer, HIV-Associated Sensory Neuropathy depression,\ndystonia, epilepsy, digestive diseases gliomas, hepatitis C, Huntington's\ndisease, leukemia, skin tumors, methicillin-resistant Staphylococcus aureus\n(MRSA), Parkinson's disease, pruritus, posttraumatic stress disorder (PTSD),\npsoriasis, sickle-cell disease,sleep apnea, and anorexia nervosa.. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I HOPE THIS POST\nPERSUADES WORLD GOVERNMENTS TO DE-CRIMINALIZE CANNABIS, TO ALLOW THEIR DENIZENS\nEXPLODE TO HIGHER CONSCIOUSNESS, &nbsp;AFTER\n21ST DEC 2012,&nbsp; TO UPGRADE DNA TO 12\nSTRAND,&nbsp; AND MAKE THIS PLANET MORE\nPEACEFUL AND WORTH LIVING.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-MgE1TgDnIaA/URxNmn9ZX8I/AAAAAAAAe_k/MYrYec3Qk78/s1600/kumbh-mela-hindu-holy-festival-2013-aarti_64174_600x450.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"426\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-MgE1TgDnIaA/URxNmn9ZX8I/AAAAAAAAe_k/MYrYec3Qk78/s640/kumbh-mela-hindu-holy-festival-2013-aarti_64174_600x450.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Western press is\nfull of sarcasm about the naked sadhus with ash smeared bodies. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Let me educate them.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These sadhus live in\nseclusion and come down from the Himalayas only for the Kumbh Mela. They are\nTantrics and NOT hedonists. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-wdTSK3al7C4/URvjfEZQftI/AAAAAAAAe9g/Y1EyMeyXDp4/s1600/imagesghhtt.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-wdTSK3al7C4/URvjfEZQftI/AAAAAAAAe9g/Y1EyMeyXDp4/s640/imagesghhtt.jpg\" width=\"356\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Tantrics can seduce and\nmanipulate , such is their magnetism, but they are not allowed to do that.&nbsp; They could maintain huge penile erections the\nwhole day in front of a cheering crowd and lift huge boulders with sheer prick\npower -- or suck water from a bowl by using the penis like a straw. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is why most of\nthem are naked , cover themselves in ash and mud and hold human skulls to\nrevolt the senses of selfish learners who want a crash course in Tantra so that\nthey can grab power in society.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Db7PbwHOuYY/URvjNYNgsHI/AAAAAAAAe9Y/wtOAE-JjodI/s1600/imagesuuybvd.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em;
