font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Punch into Google\nsearch <b><span style=\"color: red;\">AWAKENING AND RAISING KUNDALINI &nbsp;VADAKAYIL.</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One day one of his devotees named Tambiran due to his &nbsp;excessive veneration, &nbsp;was making preparations to do render homage to\nhis new guru, &nbsp;like to one of the idols of the &nbsp;gods in the temple (abhishekam). &nbsp;He obtained\nflowers, oil, sandal paste, milk and other ingredients and actually wanted to pour\nthis over the head of his \u201cliving god\u201d. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ramana was filthy, his hair had grown very\nlong and had become a dishevelled and matted mass and his fingernails had grown\nso long and crooked, that he was unable to use his hands for any useful purpose.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To prevent this, Ramana\ntook a piece of charcoal and the next day, before Tambiran &nbsp;arrived, wrote on the wall in Tamil, \u201c This\n[food] alone is the service [needed] for this [body].\u201d&nbsp; &nbsp;Only\nthen people came to know that this silent drifter was educated and able to read\nand write. And that made people even more curious.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Amongst the admirers\nwho had started to visit Ramana regularly, &nbsp;was a highly-placed official called\nVenkataramana Iyer. When he realized that the Swami was able to write, he told\nRamana that unless he tells him where he isfrom, he wont go to attent office or\neven eat even if it means that he may be dismissed from his job.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This moved the\nyoung Swami and he wrote down the words on the wall with charcoal ,\n\u201cVenkataraman, Tiruchuli\u201d. This would help his mother and brother to meet him later.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One day his devotees\ngot together , and forcibly gave him a bath, cut off his matted locks and cut\nhis long nails. &nbsp;As long as he was dirty\nand disheveled people were afraid to touch him. So now the devotees built a &nbsp;bamboo fence around him for his protection. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ramana recalls \u201c When my head was shaven\nclean, I began to wonder whether I had a head or not, it felt so light. I shook\nmy head this way and that to assure myself that it was there. That showed the\namount of burden I had been carrying on my head.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-5TcAZdklGXE/UREoayvUzII/AAAAAAAAeJQ/urYTs5deZeo/s1600/1534333310_54a7c60f74_o.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"265\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-5TcAZdklGXE/UREoayvUzII/AAAAAAAAeJQ/urYTs5deZeo/s400/1534333310_54a7c60f74_o.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ramana owed a lot to a\nMalayali from Kerala by the name of Palaniswami. He was at least &nbsp;20 years older than &nbsp;Ramana. &nbsp;He was a Ganesha devotee . One day someone\ntold him \u201cWhat is the use of spending your &nbsp;lifetime with this stone ? There is a young\nSwami in flesh and blood at Gurumurtam. He is steeped in austerities (tapas)\nlike the youthful Dhruva mentioned in the puranas. If you go and serve him, and\nadhere to him, your life would serve its purpose.\u201d &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Others also drew his attention to the fact\nthat the Swami was without a personal attendant at the time and that it would\nbe a blessing to serve such a great liberated soul. &nbsp;Spurred on in this way Palaniswami went to\nGurumurtam. &nbsp;When he saw the young Swami,\nhe recognized that he had found his master. &nbsp;He became a devoted companion of Sri Ramana\nfollowing him everywhere like a &nbsp;shadow.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If he had to leave he used to lock the door at Gurumurtam, so that nobody could\npester the Swami while he was away, and he would always return as&nbsp; quickly as he could. Nobody was allowed to\nsee Ramana without his permission. He would accept the various food offerings\nfrom visitors, mix them up into a paste and at noon give Ramana a cupful of it\nto eat. The rest he gave back as&nbsp; prasad\nto the visitors.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Some time in May 1898, after a little over one year spent at\nGurumurtam, Ramana and Palaniswami moved to the adjoining mango grove. Ramana\nremembers, \u201cUnder a mango tree they erected something overhead to prevent rain\nfrom falling on me. There was, however, not enough space under it even to\nstretch my legs fully while sleeping. So I used to sit almost all the time like\na bird in its nest. Opposite my shelter Palaniswami also had a small shed. In\nthe huge garden, only two of us used to stay.\u201d&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-waDynwh8Fwk/UREok4UF1WI/AAAAAAAAeJY/jPFGH4HIPZM/s1600/706182247_7795db1aeb_b.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-waDynwh8Fwk/UREok4UF1WI/AAAAAAAAeJY/jPFGH4HIPZM/s400/706182247_7795db1aeb_b.jpg\" width=\"300\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Palaniswami, who had access to a library in town, brought back a number\nof books in Tamil on Vedanta, such as Kaivalya Navaneeta, Yoga Vasistha and\nShankaras Vivekachudamani. &nbsp;Ramana read\neach of the books, immediately grasped the meaning, remembered everything and\nimparted the essence of it to Palaniswami. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Palaniswami would die in Maharshi Ramana\u2019s\narms. Ramana placed on hand on his spiritual heart ( right side of chest ) and one on the left side of his head\nwhen he was dying, to make him Jivan Mulkt. &nbsp;But after he removed his hands Palaniswami\nopened his eyes and then died -- and hence it was not a success. &nbsp;He would always regret this incident.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ramana would do\nthe same thing to him own mother much later. &nbsp;He was able to liberate her from\nthe endless cycle of births and hence she was buried in a meditative pose \u2013 NOT cremated as is Hindu custom.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-nIxJE4yuvSI/UREnv2QcNaI/AAAAAAAAeI4/aeYGl0g_Ljw/s1600/20100216_5579_thumb.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-nIxJE4yuvSI/UREnv2QcNaI/AAAAAAAAeI4/aeYGl0g_Ljw/s400/20100216_5579_thumb.jpg\" width=\"300\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Above picture-- A Hindu saint being buried ( NOT cremated ). Camphor and salt is used. &nbsp;Such a body of a Buddhist Sri Lankan saint was stolen and this is what is being touted as the body of Francis Xavier.&nbsp;<span class=\"f\" style=\"background-color: white; font-family: arial, sans-serif; font-size: x-small; line-height: 16px;\">&nbsp;</span></span></i><br />\n<span class=\"f\" style=\"background-color: white; color: #666666; font-family: arial, sans-serif; font-size: x-small; line-height: 16px;\"><br /></span>\n<span class=\"f\" style=\"background-color: white; font-family: arial, sans-serif; font-size: x-small; line-height: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Punch into google search&nbsp;</span></span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\">PORTUGUESE INQUISITION IN GOA ORDERED BY FRANCIS\nXAVIER VADAKAYIL</span></b></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">At a funeral Ramana\u2019s uncle\nheard the news and he came to visit him, and take him back home . &nbsp;He tried talking to him , but Ramana would not\ntalk or even show a sign of recognition.&nbsp;\nThe uncle finally had no alternative but to give up.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Dec 1898 his mother Alagammal\ncame to visit him for the first time, accompanied by his eldest brother\nNagaswami.&nbsp; Ramana would not talk to them.\nBitterly she complained about his neglected bodily condition and implored him\nto come home with her, but he did not react.&nbsp;\nDay after day they came up to see him, brought him sweets and entreated\nhim tirelessly, but all to no avail. Ramana remained silent. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Alagammal tried\neverything. &nbsp;One day when she broke down\nin tears, he was unable to bear it any longer and simply went away. Once she\ndespairingly turned to the others present and asked for their support. &nbsp;Then one of them said to Ramana, \u201cYour mother\nis weeping and praying. Why do you not answer her? &nbsp;Whether it is \u2018yes\u2019 or \u2018no\u2019, why not give her\na reply? &nbsp;Swami need not break his vow of\nsilence. &nbsp;Here is pencil and paper. Swami\nmay at least write out what he has to say.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So Ramana wrote down<i>, \u201cThe Ordainer controls the fate of souls\nin accordance with their past deeds \u2013 their prarabdhakarma. Whatever is\ndestined not to happen will not happen, - try how hard you may. Whatever is\ndestined to happen will happen, do what you may to stop it. This is certain.\nThe best course, therefore, is for one to be silent.\u201d<o:p></o:p></i></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-O_e9ur9dZzE/UREpAZTwKZI/AAAAAAAAeJw/T6FuL8tIvzE/s1600/ramana_maharshi_mother.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-O_e9ur9dZzE/UREpAZTwKZI/AAAAAAAAeJw/T6FuL8tIvzE/s400/ramana_maharshi_mother.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Whether this message\nconvinced his deeply religious mother or not, there was nothing left for her to\ndo but to leave him to the life he had embarked upon. Furthermore Nagaswami\u2019s\nholidays were coming to an end and he had to return to his office for work .\nWithout having achieved what they had set out to achieve and with a heavy &nbsp;heart, they returned to Manamadurai.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-WF1au7g3xjk/UREor6vG_zI/AAAAAAAAeJg/qMLuSaW4EgY/s1600/imagesbnmj.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"299\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-WF1au7g3xjk/UREor6vG_zI/AAAAAAAAeJg/qMLuSaW4EgY/s400/imagesbnmj.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Gradually more\nfollowers came to live with Ramana and Palaniswami. When Ramana\u2019s mother&nbsp; joined the community in 1916 she instigated\nregular housekeeping chores and regular cooking. But Ramana made it clear in\nseveral remarks that he preferred the simplicity of the years when they lived\nfrom hand to mouth.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ganapati Sastri, also\ncalled Ganapati Muni \u2013 Muni means the wise, the scholar, the saint \u2013 was the\nmost famous and erudite of Sri Ramana\u2019s disciples. &nbsp;He was a Telugu Brahmin. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One day he asked Ramana\n\u201c Pray enlighten me about the nature of tapas.\u201d <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For 15 minutes the\nSwami kept silent and looked at Ganapati, who sat at his feet full of\nexpectation. Then he answered, <i>\u201cIf one watches whence this notion of \u2018I\u2019\nsprings, the mind will be absorbed into that. That is tapas. If a mantra is\nrepeated, and attention directed to the source whence the mantra-sound is\nproduced, the mind will be absorbed in that. That is tapas.</i>\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This was the first time\nthat Sri Ramana gave a verbal answer to a question. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Until then he had kept\nsilent and had always written the answers down. For Ganapati Muni this was a\nreal revelation. His heart was filled with ecstatic joy and he meditated at the\nfeet of his new master until the evening.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The following day Ganapati Muni wrote\nfull of enthusiasm to his family and his disciples, \u201cI have found my Master, my\nGuru. He is the Sage of Arunachala known as Brahmanaswami. He is no ordinary\nSwami. He is a great Seer, a mighty spiritual personality. To me and to you all\nhe is Bhagavan Sri Ramana Maharshi [elevated great Seer Ramana]. Let the whole\nworld know him as such.\u201d</span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">From that moment on the\nSwami became known as the Maharshi Bhagavan. Ganapati Muni and his followers\nmade Sri Ramana known to a wide circle in India.</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Englishman Frank H.\nHumphreys was the first western disciple who came to Ramana, in January 1911.\nHe reports about his visit, \u201cFor half an hour I looked Him in the eyes which\nnever changed their expression of deep contemplation. I began to realize somewhat\nthat the body is the Temple of the Holy Ghost \u2013 I could only feel His body was\nnot the man, it was the instrument of God, merely a sitting motionless corpse\nfrom which God was radiating terrifically. My own sensations were\nindescribable.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ramana became\nrelatively well known in and out of India after 1934 when Paul Brunton, having\nfirst visited Ramana in January 1931, published the book A Search in Secret\nIndia. In this book he described his meeting with Ramana Maharshi, and the\neffect this meeting had on him. Brunton also describes how Ramana's fame had\nspread, \"so that pilgrims to the temple were often induced to go up the\nhill and see him before they returned home\", and the talks Ramana had with\na great variety of visitors and devotees.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/--uSW4jgNqhU/UREslvoioLI/AAAAAAAAeKQ/GK0eae1o6rY/s1600/rona00y.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/--uSW4jgNqhU/UREslvoioLI/AAAAAAAAeKQ/GK0eae1o6rY/s320/rona00y.jpg\" width=\"304\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Brunton calls Ramana \"one of the\nlast of India's spiritual supermen\", and describes his affection toward\nRamana:--</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201c I like him greatly\nbecause he is so simple and modest, when an atmosphere of authentic greatness\nlies so palpably around him; because he makes no claims to occult powers and\nhierophantic knowledge to impress the mystery loving nature of his countrymen;\nand because he is so totally without any traces of pretension that he strongly\nresists every effort to canonize him during his lifetime\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">While staying at Sri\nRamanasramam, Brunton had an experience of a \"sublimely\nall-embracing\" awareness, a \"Moment of Illumination\".<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The book was a bestseller,\nand introduced Ramana Maharshi to a wider audience in the west.</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Till his death in 1950\nRamana lived in Sri Ramanashramam, the ashram that developed around the\nmother's tomb. &nbsp;Ramana often walked from\nSkandashram to mother's tomb. In December 1922 he didn't return to Skandashram,\nand settled at the base of the Hill, and Sri Ramanasramam started to develop. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-YCATwIun-Zg/UREssOkcpbI/AAAAAAAAeKY/nBTCN58A3II/s1600/rcna613.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-YCATwIun-Zg/UREssOkcpbI/AAAAAAAAeKY/nBTCN58A3II/s1600/rcna613.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In November 1948, a\ntiny cancerous lump was found on Ramana's arm and was removed in February 1949\nby the ashram's doctor. &nbsp;Soon, another\ngrowth appeared and another operation was done by an eminent surgeon in March\n1949 with radium applied. The doctor told Ramana that a complete amputation of\nthe arm to the shoulder was required to save his life, but he refused. &nbsp;A third and fourth operation were performed in\nAugust and December 1949, but only weakened him. &nbsp;Other systems of medicine were then tried; all\nproved fruitless and were stopped by the end of March when devotees gave up all\nhope. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To devotees who begged him to cure\nhimself for the sake of his followers, Ramana is said to have replied,\n\"Why are you so attached to this body? &nbsp;Let it go\" and \"Where can I go? &nbsp;I am here.\"</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-7IHypskDoTE/UREpJOAXZyI/AAAAAAAAeJ4/b_JVgo3NREo/s1600/rcna307_1922_Ramanasramam.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"256\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-7IHypskDoTE/UREpJOAXZyI/AAAAAAAAeJ4/b_JVgo3NREo/s400/rcna307_1922_Ramanasramam.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;By April 1950, Ramana was too\nweak to go to the hall and visiting hours were limited. Visitors would file\npast the small room where he spent his final days to get one final glimpse. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Henri Cartier-Bresson,\nthe legendary French photographer and master of the \"decisive\nmoment\", arrived at the ashram in the first week of April 1950, just ten\ndays earlier, as the Maharshi lay terminally ill in his ashram.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Cartier-Bresson\nhad the knack of being at the right place at the right time.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Henri Cartier-Bresson, &nbsp;recounted the event:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"It is a most\nastonishing experience. I was in the open space in front of my house, when my\nfriends drew my attention to the sky, where I saw a vividly-luminous shooting\nstar with a luminous tail, unlike any shooting star I had before seen, coming\nfrom the South, moving slowly across the sky and, reaching the top of\nArunachala, disappeared behind it. Because of its singularity we all guessed\nits import and immediately looked at our watches \u2013 it was 8:47 \u2013 and then raced\nto the Ashram only to find that our premonition had been only too sadly true:\nthe Master had passed into parinirvana at that very minute.\"&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ramana\nMaharshi was 71 years old at the time of his death.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Cartier-Bresson took\nsome of the last photographs of Ramana on April 4, 1950, and went on to take\npictures of the mahasamadhi preparations.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-k3hfqp4YOZg/URElyHrTT8I/AAAAAAAAeIw/K24ziuiWD5Y/s1600/PAR93902.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"360\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-k3hfqp4YOZg/URElyHrTT8I/AAAAAAAAeIw/K24ziuiWD5Y/s400/PAR93902.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\" In his notes,\nHenri Cartier-Bresson wrote, \"The Maharshi was the most accomplished human\nbeing I have ever met.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Here in India, where\nthousands of so-called holy men claim close tune with the infinite, it is said\nthat the most remarkable thing about Ramana Maharshi was that he never claimed\nanything remarkable for himself, yet became one of the most loved and respected\nof all.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Objects being touched\nor used by him were highly valued by his devotees, \"as they considered it\nto be prasad and that it passed on some of the power and blessing of the Guru\nto them\". Also the water which he used to wash his hands was valued. The\nbathing-water he used became an object for achamaniyam, \"sipping drops of\nwater for religious purpose\".Sri Ramana strongly discouraged this and\nconstantly reminded people to turn within. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He charged no money,\nand was adamant that no one ever ask for money (or anything else) in his name;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He never promoted or\ncalled attention to himself. Instead, Ramana remained in one place for 54\nyears, offering spiritual guidance to anyone of any background who came to him,\nand asking nothing in return.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He considered humility\nto be the highest quality.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He said the deep sense\nof peace one felt around a jnani was the surest indicator of their spiritual\nstate, that equality towards all was a true sign of liberation, and that what a\ntrue jnani did was always for others, not themselves.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ramana never promoted\nany lineage.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">His awareness of\nhimself as consciousness was unaffected by this physical transition and it remained\ncontinuous and undimmed for the rest of his life.&nbsp; &nbsp;In\nHindu parlance he had `realized the Self', &nbsp;that is to say, he had realized by direct\nexperience that nothing existed apart from an indivisible and universal\nconsciousness which was experienced in its unmanifest form as beingness or\nawareness and in its manifest form as the appearance of the universe. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He shared in the\ncommunal work and for many years he rose at 3 a.m. in order to prepare food for\nthe residents of the ashram. His sense of equality was legendary. When visitors\ncame to see him - it made no difference whether they were VIPs, peasants or\nanimals - they would all be treated with equal respect and consideration.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">His egalitarian concern\neven extended to the local trees; he discouraged his followers from picking\nflowers or leaves off them and he tried to ensure that whenever fruit was taken\nfrom the ashram trees it was always done in such a way that the tree only\nsuffered a minimum amount of pain. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-I4-CQqe86NM/UREszX30EaI/AAAAAAAAeKg/L4NMxWXUADI/s1600/Arunachala_Deepam-051-300x217.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"231\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-I4-CQqe86NM/UREszX30EaI/AAAAAAAAeKg/L4NMxWXUADI/s320/Arunachala_Deepam-051-300x217.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Throughout this period\n( 1925-50) the centre of ashram life was the small hall where Sri Ramana lived,\nslept and held court. He spent most of his day sitting in one corner radiating\nhis silent power and simultaneously fielding questions from the constant flow\nof visitors who descended on him from every corner of the globe. He rarely\ncommitted his ideas to paper and so the verbal replies given out during this\nperiod (by far the most well documented of his life) represent the largest\nsurviving source of his teachings. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These verbal teachings\nflowed authoritatively from his direct knowledge that consciousness was the\nonly existing reality. Consequently, all his explanations and instructions were\ngeared to convincing his followers that this was their true and natural state. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Few of his followers\nwere capable of assimilating this truth in its highest and most undiluted form\nand so he often adapted his teachings to conform to the limited understanding\nof the people who came to him for advice. Because of this tendency it is\npossible to distinguish many different levels of his teachings. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/--Us_hB3rg78/UREo4KsWh-I/AAAAAAAAeJo/RLPRrodidXk/s1600/ramana_maharshi_tiger_skin.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/--Us_hB3rg78/UREo4KsWh-I/AAAAAAAAeJo/RLPRrodidXk/s320/ramana_maharshi_tiger_skin.jpg\" width=\"318\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">At the highest level\nthat could be expressed in words he would say that consciousness alone exists.\nIf this was received with skepticism he would say that awareness of this truth\nis obscured by the self-limiting ideas of the mind and that if these ideas were\nabandoned then the reality of consciousness would be revealed. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Most of his followers\nfound this high-level approach a little too theoretical - they were so immersed\nin the self-limiting ideas that Sri Ramana was encouraging them to drop that\nthey felt that the truth about consciousness would only be revealed to them if\nthey underwent a long period of spiritual practice. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To satisfy such people\nSri Ramana prescribed an innovative method of self-attention which he called\nself-enquiry.&nbsp; He recommended this\ntechnique so often and so vigorously that it was regarded by many people as the\nmost distinctive motif in his teachings.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sri Ramana Maharshi,\nwho has opened up the path of advaita Hindusim of Adi Shankaracharya&nbsp; ( 2000 BC )&nbsp;\nto all people, &nbsp;is one of the most\nremarkable sages of the modern era.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>He was the last of the great seers.&nbsp;</b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-AFRF8NnqwgQ/UREuBCyNqtI/AAAAAAAAeKo/VEey3QT_I1c/s1600/downloadbnnm.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"267\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-AFRF8NnqwgQ/UREuBCyNqtI/AAAAAAAAeKo/VEey3QT_I1c/s400/downloadbnnm.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: Times New Roman, serif;\"><b>Grace and peace!</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: Times New Roman, serif;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<object class=\"BLOGGER-youtube-video\" classid=\"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000\" codebase=\"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0\" data-thumbnail-src=\"http://2.gvt0.com/vi/FiUtUNxzXWY/0.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"320\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"http://www.youtube.com/v/FiUtUNxzXWY&fs=1&source=uds\" /><param name=\"bgcolor\" value=\"#FFFFFF\" /><param name=\"allowFullScreen\" value=\"true\" /><embed width=\"320\" height=\"266\"  src=\"http://www.youtube.com/v/FiUtUNxzXWY&fs=1&source=uds\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" allowfullscreen=\"true\"></embed></object></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Prayer to Lord Ganapathi&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Arunachalavarketha Akshara malai chatha,\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Karunakara Ganapathiye Karamaruli\nkaapaye.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Oh merciful Ganapathi , give a hand and\nhelp&nbsp; me, <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">To make a garland of letters suitable\nfor Lord Arunachala. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Refrain ( this refrain&nbsp; has to be chanted after each verse) <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Arunachala Siva, Arunachala Siva, <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Arunachala Siva, Arunachala Siva, <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Arunachala Siva, Arunachala Siva, <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Arunachala Siva, Arunachala Siva. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Arunachalamena agame ninaippavar, <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Agathai aruppai arunachalane.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;1 <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Oh Arunachala, cut of the pride in the\nminds, <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Of those who meditate on Arunachala. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Azhagu sundaram pol agavum neeyum uttha <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Binnamay iruppom arunachalaa.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 2 <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Oh Arunachala , like the words Azhagu in\nTamil, <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">And Sundaram in Sanskrit mean the same\nbeauty, <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Let our mind and you be not different\nand be same. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Agam pugum theerthu , unnaka guhai\nchirayai, <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Amarvithathen kolo arunachalaa.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 3 <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Oh Arunachala , why did you enter in my\nmind, <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Drew me,&nbsp;\nmade me imprisoned in your mind? <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Aarum kavenai yandanai yagathidil, <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Akhilam pazhithidum arunachalam.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 4 <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Oh Arunachala, after&nbsp; having drawn the useless me,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">If you remove me later, the world would\nfind fault with you. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Ippazhi thappunai yeninai pitha , <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Yini yaar viduvaar arunachalam.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 5 <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Oh Arunachala , get rid of this bad\nname, <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Oh Mad one, who would leave you now. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Yeendridum annayir peritharul purivo, <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Yidhuvo unadharul Aunachala.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 6\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Oh Arunachala&nbsp; who is kinder than my mother, <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">This is indeed your great grace. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Unaye mathi odathulathin mel, <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Uruthiyayiruppai Arunachala.</span>&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;7\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Oh Arunachala, please change yourself, <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">And sit firmly on my changing mind. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Oor chuthu ulam vidathu unnai tatangida,\n<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Un azhagai kattu Arunachala.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;\n8 <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Oh Arunachala , show me your beauty, <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">So that my mind ,which wanders round\nbecomes firm. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Yenai azhithippo yenai kalava vidil, <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Ithuvo vanmai Arunachala.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;\n9 <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Oh Arunachala, Are you man enough ,&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">So that&nbsp;\nyou destroy my ego, <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">And merge me with yourself? <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Yen inda urakkam yenai pirar izhukka, <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Ithu unakku azhago, Arunachala.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 10 <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Oh Arunachala, Is it pretty for you, <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">To be asleep when others drag me to\nthings bad? <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Iympula kalvar agathinir pugum pothu, <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Agathu nee ilayo, Arunachala.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;\n11 <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Oh Arunachala, Are you not within me, <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">When the thief of five senses enters\nwithin me?&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Oruvanaam unnai olithavar varuvaar,<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Un chootheyidhu, Arunachala.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;\n12 <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Oh Arunachala, If the one who hides you,\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Appear before me, it is only your\ndeceit, Oh God <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Omgara porul oppu uyar villoy, <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Unai yaar arivaar , Arunachala.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;13 <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Oh Arunachala, who is great and\nincomparable, <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Who can claim ever&nbsp; to know you? <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Ouai&nbsp;\npol , yenakku un arulai thandu yenai, <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Aluvathu un kadan, Arunachala.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 14 <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Oh Arunachala, It is your bounden duty, <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">To control me after giving your grace ,\njust like my mother. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Kannukku kaanai kannindri kanunai, <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Kanuvathu yevar paar , Arunachala.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 15 <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Oh Arunachala, you watch over&nbsp; me yourself, <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">To&nbsp;\nhelp me see you with the eye of the eyes, <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">When I am&nbsp; trying to see you with my&nbsp; eyes. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Kandham irumb pol kavarndu yennai\nvidamal, <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Kalandhu yennodu iruppai ,\nArunachala.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;\n16 <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Oh Arunachala, be always with me , <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Like the magnet attracting a piece of steel,\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">And be always merge with me&nbsp;&nbsp; never leaving me. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Giri uruvagiya kirubai kadale, <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Krubai koorndu arulvay, Arunachala.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 17 <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Oh Arunachala who is the ocean of mercy,\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">With the looks of a mountain, please\nbless me with your grace. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Keezh melengum kilar oli mani yen, <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Keezhmayayai paaz chey, Arunachala.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 18 <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Oh Arunachala , Who shines like a gem, <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">In the minds of the great as well as\nthe&nbsp; base ones, <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Destroy this quality of baseness within\nme. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Kutham uthu aruthennai gunamay\npaninthal, <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Guru uruvay olir , Arunachala.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;\n19<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">And make me pure, through the mouth of\nthe teacher.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Koor vaat kanniyar kodumayir padathu\narul, <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Koorndu&nbsp;\nyennai Cherndhu arul, Arunachala.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 20 <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Oh Arunachala, Be merciful&nbsp; with me and bless me, <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">So that I do not fall in the hooks of\nthe bad ones, with sharp swords. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Kenjiyum vanjiyay konjam irangilai, <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Anjel yendru arul, Arunachala.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;\n21 <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Oh Arunachala, like a deceiver you have\nnot shown pity on me, <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">In spite of my begging, Please tell me ,\nnot to be afraid. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Kelathu alikkum un kedil pugazhai, <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Kedu cheyyathu arul, Arunachala.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 22 <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Oh Arunachala, do not spoil your fame, <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Of giving without asking , by not giving\nto me. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Kaiyinir kaniyul mey rasam kondu uvagai,\n<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Veri kola varurl , Arunachala.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;\n23 <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;;
