font-size: 12.0pt;\">By using the juice of the truth of the\nfruit in my hand, <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Kodiyittu adiyarai kollunai kkatti , <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Kondu engan vazhven, Arunachala.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;24 <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Oh Arunachala , how will I Ever live , <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">As a slave to you who kills , <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Without killing his devotees?&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Kopamil gunathoy , kuriyay yenai kola, <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Kuray yen cheythen, Arunachala.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;25 <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Oh Arunachala , who is never angry, <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">What great did I ever do , to make you, <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Choose me to receive your grace? <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Kowthamar pothum karunai maa malaye, <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Kadai kanithu aalvay, Arunachala.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 26 <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Oh Arunachala , who is the mountain of\nmercy,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Which is being worshipped by sage\nGowthama, <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Please see me with your side long glance\nand bless me. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Chakalamum vizhungum kadir oli ina mana,\n<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Salasa malarthi yidu , Arunachala.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;27 <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Oh Arunachala , who is the light that\nswallows all,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Please make the lotus of&nbsp; my mind open fully. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Chappadu unnai charndhuna vaayaan, <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Santhamay pavan Arunachala.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;\n28 <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Oh Arunachala, when I approached you for\nfood, <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">You made me your food and made me\npeaceful. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Chitham kulira kkathir atham vaitha\namudha, <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Vaayai thira varun mathi,\nArunachala.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;\n29 <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Oh Arunachala, with a view to cool my\nmind, <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Open the nectar like mouth of the bud of\nmy mind. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Cheerai azhithu nirvanamai cheythu arut,\n<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Cheerai alitharul, Arunachala.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;\n30 <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Oh Arunachala, Remove the cloth that\ncovers my mind, <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Make me nude and again grace me with\nyour cloth of grace. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Chuka kadal ponga chollunar adanga, <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Chumma porunthidanga Arunachala.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 31 <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Oh Arunachala, to make my mind ebb with\npleasure, <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">And to make my senses under control ,\nyou occupy my mind. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Choothu cheydu yenni chothiyadini\nun&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Jothi uru kkattu , Arunachala.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;\n32 <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Oh Arunachala, from now on, do not test\nme by deceit, <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">And show me your form which shines like\na flame. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Cheppadi vithai kkathu ippadi mayakku\nvittu, <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Uru ppadu vithai kkattu ,\nArunachala.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;\n33 <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Oh Arunachala , do not show the magical\nshows <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">To make me completely confused, <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">And show me that which would build me.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Cherayenin mey neera yurugi kkan, <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Neeral azhiven , Arunachala.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;\n34 <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Oh Arunachala, If you do not unite with\nme, <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">I would melt like water and be destroyed\nby tears. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Chaiyena thallin chey vinai chudum\namala, <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Uy vagai yethu urai, Arunachala.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;35 <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Oh Arunachala , if you push me away with\ndisdain, <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Oh pure one , my actions would burn me, <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">And so tell me how should I live and\nwin. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Chollathu cholli nee , chollara\nnillendru, <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Chumma yirundhay , Arunachala.</span>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;36 <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Oh Arunachala, without talking you\ntalked to me, <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">And told me to stop talking and you kept\nquite. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Chombiyay chumma sukhamundu urangidir, <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Chol very yen gathi, Arunachala.</span>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 37 <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Oh Arunachala, If I lazily sleep in\npleasure, <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Tell me, what other&nbsp; way to get away is there for me. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Chowriyam kaattinai , chazha kathathu\nyendre, <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Chaliyathu irunday, Arunachala.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 38\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Oh Arunachala, you showed me your\nprowess&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">And the darkness in me vanished, <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">And you remained still motion less. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Gnamaliyir kedaa naan yendru uruthi yay,\n<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Nadi nin urave, Arunachala.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;\n39 <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Oh Arunachala, I am worse than a dog, <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">For when did I ever steadfastly seek\nyou. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Gnanamillathu , un asayar thalar vara, <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Gnanam therithu arul, Arunachala</span>.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 40 <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Oh Arunachala, I sought you without\nwisdom, <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">But did only get tired because of my\ndesire, <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">And so grace me with the wisdom to seek\nyou. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Jnimiru po neeyum malarnthilai yendre,<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Ner nindaranai , yen arunachala.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;\n41 <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Oh Arunachala, When I as a bee wanted to\nenter you,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">And when I thought that you have not\nopened&nbsp; like a bud, <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">To my surprise&nbsp; I found you standing in front of me. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Thattuvam theriya thathanai yuthay, <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Thathuvam ithu ven, Arunachala.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;\n42 <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Oh my Arunachala , when I did not know\nthe innate philosophy, <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">You yourself stood before me as the same\ninnate philosophy. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Thane thane thathuvam idanai , <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Thane kattuvai Arunachala.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;\n43 <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Oh Arunachala , please show and make me\nrealize, <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">That you ,yourself are the innate\nphilosophy. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Thirumbi yagam thannai dina maga kan\nkaandu, <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Yeriyum yendranai, yen Arunachala.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 44\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Oh my Arunachala, You told me to turn\nand see, <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Within myself ,so that I will know it. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Deeramilakathir thediyum thanayaan , <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Thirumba vuthen arul, Arunachala.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;\n45 <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Oh Arunachala, by your grace I searched\ninside , <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Without inner courage and got you again.\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Thupparivilla ippira ppen bhayan, <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Oppidavaye , yen Arunachala.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;\n46 <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Oh my Arunachala, what is the use of\nthis birth, <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Without the&nbsp; innate knowledge, and then why, <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Should I try to compare it with that of\nothers. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Thooy mana mozhiyar thoyu mun meyygam, <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Thoyave yarul yen Arunachala.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;\n47 <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Oh my Arunachala, please bless me to\nmerge within you, <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Before the others with purer mind merge\nin you. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Dheivam yendru unnai charave , yennai, <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Chera vozhithay Arunachala.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;\n48<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Oh Arunachala , when I bent towards you,\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Thinking you are my God, you pushed me\naway. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Thedathu uttha na thiru varu nithi yaga,\n<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Thiyakkam theertharul Arunahala.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;49 <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Oh Arunachala, You are the divine\ntreasure, <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">That I got without searching for it, <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">And bless me with a stable mind. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Dhairiyamodu mun meyyaga nada yaan, <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Thattazhithen arul , Arunachala.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;50 <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Oh Arunachala, when I tried to approach\nyou with courage, <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">The boat of mine tottered and I&nbsp; fell down and so bless me. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Thottarut kai mey kattidaa yenil, <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Yaan attamaven, arul , Arunachala.</span>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;51 <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Oh Arunachala , If you do not merge in\nme, <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">When I extend my hands to touch you, <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Then I would become , a useless thing. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Thodamini yagathodu ondri yendrum, <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Chandhoda ondirda arul, Arunachala.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;\n&nbsp;52 <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Oh Arunachala, You who are without\nflaws, <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Merge with me from the inside and grace\nme, <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">To merge with the&nbsp; ever lasting joy , inside you. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Nagaikku ida milai nin nadiya venaiaru ,\n<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Nagai Yittu paar nee arunachala.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;\n53 <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Oh Arunachala, this is not the time to\nlaugh at me,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Who has sought and approached you but\nplease see me, <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">After adorning me with your grace. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Nanilai naadita naanayondri nee, <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Thanuva niranai arunachala.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;\n54 <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Oh Arunachala, without shame you stood\nlike a pillar, <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">When I came myself,&nbsp; seeking you, instead of helping me. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Ninneri yerithenai neeragidum mun, <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Nin arun mazhai pozhi Arunachala.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;\n55<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Oh Arunachala, before I turn to ash due\nto your burning advice <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Rain your nectar like grace on me,\nplease. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Nee naan ara ppuli nithangali mayama, <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Nindridu nilay arul Arunachala.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;\n56 <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Oh Arunachala, destroy the difference\nbetween you and me, <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">And bless me with the state of&nbsp; ecstasic joy. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Nunn uruvay ninai yaan vinnuru nannida, <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Yennalai yirumen ara Arunachala.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;\n57 <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Oh Arunachala, please cut off my nets of\nthought, <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">That prevent me to see your subtle\ndivine form. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Noolarivu ariya pethaiyan yendran, <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Malari varuthu arul, Arunachala.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;58 <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Oh Arunachala , grace me by cutting&nbsp; off my wrong knowledge, <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">For I am a simpleton who does not have\nbookish knowledge. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Nekku nekkurugi yaan pukkida unnai puga,\n<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Nakkaha ninranai , Arunachala.</span>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;59\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Oh Arunachala, when melting with\nemotions, I tried to enter you, <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">As my refuge&nbsp;&nbsp; but&nbsp;\nYou stood motionless and naked before me. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Nesa mila yenakkun asayai kaati nee, <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Mosam cheyyatharul, Arunachala.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;\n60 <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Oh Arunachala, Do not forsake&nbsp; me now . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">After showing your desire to me ,&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">As&nbsp;\nI&nbsp; was not interested in you\nearlier. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Naindazhi kaniya nalanilai padathir, <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Nadi ut kol nalam, Arunachala.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;\n61 <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Oh Arunachala, Unripe fruits do not lead\nto good, <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Ripen me and merge me with you. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Nondhida thunthanai thandu yenai\nkondilai, <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Yandaka nee yenakku Arunachala.&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;62\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Oh Arunachala, you are like the God of\ndeath me, <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">As you gave me yourself and painlessly\ntook me within you.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Nokkiye&nbsp;\nkaruthi mey thakkiye pakkuvam&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Aakki nee aandarul, Arunachala.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;\n63 <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Oh Arunachala , see me touch me and\nripen me, <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">And then take me and then&nbsp; rule over me. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Pathi maal vidanthalai yuthiru\nmunamarul,&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Pathida arul puri, Arunachala.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;\n64 <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Oh Arunachala, shower your grace and\nsave me, <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Before the poison of delusion gets hold\nof me. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Parthu arun maalara parthilai yenin\narul, <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Par unakkar cholvar, Arunachala.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;</span>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;65\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Oh Arunachala , If you do not see and\ndispel my illusion, <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Who is there , who can request you to do\nthat. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Pithu vittu unai ner pithanakkinai arul,\n<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Pitham theli marundu Arunachala.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;66 <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Oh Arunachala, You cured my mad desire\nfor the world, <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">And made me mad for you and your grace, <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">And you are the only medicine to cure\nthis madness.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Bheethiyil unai char, bheethiyil unai\ncher, <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Bheethi undanakka yen, Arunachala.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;\n67 <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Oh Arunachala , why are you having fear\nto me joining you, <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">As I am joining you fearlessly and you\nare fearless. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Pullari vethurai, nallari vethurai,&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Pullidave arul , Arunachala.&nbsp;</span>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;\n68 <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Oh Arunachala, please tell me which\nknowledge is bad, <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">And which is good and bless me to shed\nthe bad knowledge. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Poo mana mamanam poorana manam kola , <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Pooranamarul Arunachala.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;\n69 <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Oh Arunachala, Bless me with complete\nknowledge, <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">For my mind is beset with the scent of\nthis world. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">And not the knowledge of&nbsp; perfection. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Peyar ninaithidave pidithu izhthanai un,\n<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Perumai yaar arivaar Arunachala.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;\n70<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Oh Arunachala, You pulled me towards\nyou, <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Even when I just brought your name to my\nmind, <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">And who can ever aptly tell your\ngreatness? <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Peythanam vida , vidaa peyayi\npidithanai, <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Peyan akkinai yen Arunachala.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;\n71 <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Oh my Arunachala , when the devilishness\nleft me, <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">You firmly caught hold of me like a\ndevil, <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">And made me mad for you like&nbsp; a devil. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Painkodi ya naan pathu indri vaadamar, <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Pathu kodaay kaa varunachala.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;\n72 <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Oh Arunachala, Please be a staff&nbsp; to support me, <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">As I am a tender creeper and would wilt\n, if I do not have a support. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Bodathai kattinai Arunachala.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;\n73 <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Oh Arunachala , Using the dust to make\nme loose myself, <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">And completely steal away my understanding,\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">You blessed me by showing ,&nbsp; your knowledge to me. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Pokkum varavumil podu veli yinil arut, <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Porattam kattu, Arunachala.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;\n74 <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Oh Arunachala, In my mind which is a\npublic road <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Where there is no coming and going of\nthoughts, <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Stage and show the clashes of your\ndivine self. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Poudhikama mudar pathu athu nalum mun, <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Pavisu kandu uravu arul,\nArunachala.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;\n75 <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Oh Arunachala, cut off my physical\nattachments, <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">And grace me with the splendorous sight\nof yours. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Malai marundhida nee malaithidavo varun,\n<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Malai marunday olir, Arunachala.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;\n76 <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Oh Arunachala, When you cured me of my\ndisease, <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Of confusion about the problems of birth\nand life, <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Why should I bother and so please shine\nas the mountain of cure. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Manam kondu urubhavar manathai azhitha\npin,<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Manamillathu olir Arunachala.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;77 <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Oh Arunachala ,you have destroyed the\nego, <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Of the people who were suffering from\nego, <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">And please shine as something beyond\nego. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Minjidir kenjidum konja vari vaniyaan, <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Vanchiyathu arul yenai, Arunachala.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;78 <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Oh Arunachala , I am an ignoramus , who\nbegs, <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">When some one overwhelms and rules over\nme, <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">And so without deceiving me show your\ngrace to me. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Oh Arunachala, Protect me from this\ngreat illusion,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">When I am floundering like a ship\nwithout helmsman,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">And caught amidst, the wind and storm of\na storm. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Mudiyadi kaanaa mudi vidu thanai ner, <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; trying to find your head and feet, <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Be like a mother and help me to untie\nthe knot. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;;
